ROW.NAME: 税管员
ROW.SQLWHE: deptid like (select decode(scope,'ALL','%',substr('[%SYS_DEPTID]',0,7 )||'%') from v_depts where id='[%SYS_DEPTID]')

ROW.DATDSC: select flag,rownum rn,id,name,addr,lawman,taxman from( select '' flag,a.id id,max(b.name) name,max(b.addr) addr,max(b.lawman) lawman,max(c.name) taxman from tax_taxdata a,v_tax_company b,v_tax_taxman c where a.id=b.id and b.ammno is null and b.taxman=c.id(+) and b.taxman like '%[%TAXMAN]%' and b.typclsid like '[%TYPCLSID]%' --and b.taxman like '[%TAXMNY]%' [%TAXMANSTR] [%SWJGSTR] --and b.swjg_dm like (select decode(scope,'ALL','%',substr('[%SYS_DEPTID]',0,7 )||'%') from v_depts where id='[%SYS_DEPTID]') and (a.id like '[%CMID]%' or b.name like '%[%CMID]%') group by a.id )
select name from tax_company where id like '[%CORPID]'
